attributes.action: a general election should be automatic to change Prime ministers
attributes.additional_details: This is wrong and many MPs agree and many have stated this in the national press including Boris Johnson who wrote in a national newspaper that it was un-democratic when Gordon Brown became Prime minister without a general election but now see nothing wrong with the  system now it is him.
attributes.background: It is un-democratic and wrong for a small number of voters to be the only ones who get to vote for a new Prime minister an force their choice onto the counntry excluding all other voters like now only 160,000 conservative members
